p: Waqas Younis performed experiments and collected data from various activities. Alamgeer and V. B. Schini-Kerth designed this study and provided the necessary facilities for experiments. Priscila de Souza and Arquimedes Gasparotto Junior provided help in diuretic assays and the correction of the manuscript. Denise Brentan Silva and Samara Requena Nocchi performed the chemical analyses and described the information about the chemical constituents. Ishfaq Ali Bukhari, Fahim Vohra, and Sibtain Afzal also helped in conducting the study and writing of the research paper. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
